hooks.command: FILE_PATH=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path') && uv run ruff format "$FILE_PATH"
hooks.description: Auto-format Python files with ruff before writing

hooks.command: uv run ruff check . && uv run mypy src && uv run pytest
hooks.description: Run quality checks before git commits

hooks.command: FILE_PATH=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path') && uv run ruff check --fix "$FILE_PATH"
hooks.description: Auto-fix linting issues after writing Python files

hooks.command: FILE_PATH=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path') && FILE_NAME=$(basename "$FILE_PATH" .py) && uv run pytest tests/test_${FILE_NAME}.py
hooks.description: Run related tests when saving Python files
